title: Homestead gas reprice fork hash mismatch
body:

Network Id: 1

OS: Linux ubuntu 14.04


#### Expected behaviour

#### Actual behaviour

BTW, this issues is said to be fixed in v1.5.2, however, it still showed up for geth v1.5.4

  This release fixes a regression that caused geth to fail to full sync past the previous (EIP150) hard fork at block number 2463000."

I almost the same issue as @hievan2016 . We are running a private chain and mining stopped today as we reached block 2463000 with this error message ` Invalid header on mined block: Homestead gas reprice fork hash mismatch: have 0x88afff5e99d7851bc0a88b5786db0dfe0f0346c9363646797fbb88ec1cbee5e4, want 0x2086799aeebeae135c246c65021c82b4e15a2c451340993aacfd2751886514f0` . I am running 1.5.8-stable and the command to start geth is `go-ethereum/build/bin/geth --nodiscover --cache=4096 --rpc --rpcaddr 0.0.0.0 --rpccorsdomain "*" --rpcapi "db,eth,net,web3,personal,debug,txpool" console`.

Any idea?
